name: @sairambokka/vlei-verifier-workflows
description: Workflows for vLEI users and vLEI credentials for the vLEI-verifier service

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:browser
scripts.workflow:singlesig-single-user-light: npm run docker:up && jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:singlesig-single-user: npm run docker:up && cross-env WORKFLOW=singlesig-single-user.yaml CONFIGURATION=configuration-singlesig-single-user.json jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:singlesig-multi-user-vlei-verif: npm run docker:up && cross-env WORKFLOW=singlesig-multi-user-vlei-verifier-router-test.yaml CONFIGURATION=configuration-singlesig-multi-user-vlei-verifier-router-test.json jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:singlesig-aid: npm run docker:up && cross-env WORKFLOW=singlesig-aid.yaml CONFIGURATION=configuration-singlesig-aid.json jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:revocation-test-singlesig: npm run docker:up && cross-env WORKFLOW=revocation-test-singlesig.yaml CONFIGURATION=configuration-revocation-test-singlesig.json jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:multisig-single-user: npm run docker:up && cross-env WORKFLOW=multisig-single-user.yaml CONFIGURATION=configuration-multisig-single-user.json jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:multisig-single-user-non-delega: npm run docker:up && cross-env WORKFLOW=multisig-single-user-non-delegated-aids.yaml CONFIGURATION=configuration-multisig-single-user-non-delegated-aids.json jest test/run-workflow.test.ts && npm run docker:down
scripts.workflow:all: npm run workflow:singlesig-single-user-light && npm run workflow:singlesig-single-user && npm run workflow:singlesig-multi-user-vlei-verifier-router-test && npm run workflow:singlesig-aid && npm run workflow:revocation-test-singlesig && npm run workflow:multisig-single-user && npm run workflow:multisig-single-user-non-delegated-aids
scripts.workflow:all:except: npm run workflow:singlesig-single-user-light && npm run workflow:singlesig-multi-user-vlei-verifier-router-test && npm run workflow:revocation-test-singlesig && npm run workflow:multisig-single-user && npm run workflow:multisig-single-user-non-delegated-aids
scripts.test:full: npm run project-checker && npm run build && npm run docker:up && npm test && npm run docker:down && npm run compatibility-checker && npm run package-checker
scripts.test:full:all: npm run project-checker && npm run build && npm run workflow:all:except && npm run compatibility-checker && npm run package-checker
scripts.docker:up: npm run docker:down && docker compose up -d
scripts.project-checker: npm install && npm run formatter && npm run linter && npm run dependency-checker
